channel.title: Help with rollback
channel.description: Hey guys, I need help with a rollback. Me and Snake came to an agreement and he changed his house. Im trying to roll back his old one but Hawk is being difficult. I know the house is only a few weeks old and was built by a number of players, so just rolling back players radius isn't working. I only know the the commands /hawk rollback p:xxx r:xx and /hawk rollback p:xxx

item.title: Help with rollback
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That should work, just be careful with radius, and if you go too far you can ‘/hawk undo’ I believe, but don’t count on it working.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rollback
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Ahh. Ill try that. Dident know that command.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rollback
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Just blow it up, much more fun ;D

But considering he was in breach of the rules, shouldn’t you be able to do:

/hawk rollback r:50 t:5d

So it rolls back everyone who’s done anything within the radius/time specified?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rollback
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Hey guys, I need help with a rollback. Me and Snake came to an agreement and he changed his house.
Im trying to roll back his old one but Hawk is being difficult.
